item.description:
Come hangout in Localytics’ new office space!

We haven’t met in while and there is a lot to talk about.  The agenda will include presentations by Yoni Samlan and Carter Jernigan of LevelUp as well as several discussions led by experts from different areas of mobile development.

Topics will include:

  1. Android Ice Cream Sandwich and Beyond:  an overview of API and UI changes.
  2. Fragment and Loader classes for Android-lifecycle-friendly asynchronous work.
  3. iOS6 topics including Passbook and CollectionViews
  4. HTML5 development using hybrid frameworks
  5. Windows 8 launch
  6. Best practices for launching your app during the holiday season
  7. Open discussion - bring a topic you'd wish to discuss

Pizza and beer will be provided.

** Entrance to our offices is on Temple Pl. **
item.name: Mobile Developers Meetup 10
